basics.name: Ricardo Spear
basics.label: Fullstack | NodeJS | React | Laravel
basics.summary: Technology oriented business analyst focused on proposing and implementing solutions to increase operations/reporting efficiency and accuracy.  Looking for a place where I can contribute and continue to expand both my technological and business background.  Once I find the right place, I intend to obtain a masters in computer science.

work.summary:
Develop Automated Business Processes which required complex data gathering and manipulation was required saving countless man hours while having a more reliable and documented process.
Insanely fast automations while using low resources by utilizing streaming technologies.
Data Validation, Data Importing, Reporting, SFTP to external servers, watching for incoming STFP files

Develop HelloWell, a consumer facing EMR portal, as a programmer and analyst using Symfony, and React.
Solely developed the Native HelloWell App using React Native featuring features such as Touch ID for both android and iOS
Implement End-End automated and Unit Testing to improve reliability.
Develop Continuous Integration processes for internal tools and modules.
Mentor developers in order for them to grow outside their comfort zone.
Support complex marketing websites with thousands of pages while maintaining reliability and quality.

Assisted in the development of an Order Management System (OMS) where shops can create orders or receive orders via API.  Developed using NodeJs, ReactJs and MongoDB. 

Optimized an Excel generating module which had severe memory limitations.  We could originally write up to 50 thousand records without consuming vast amounts of memory, after optimization we could write more than 3 million records.

Discovered serious session bugs by looking through the codes, proposed changes and helped implement them along with the team lead.

Unit Tested small critical portions of the application.

Helped develop and Order management system utilizing Laravel and AngularJs with a small Node server which enabled real-time data.

Refactored and migrated to angular a query builder which generated a user friendly interface from a complex configuration array containing over 200 data points and over 1000 possible values.

Filed a patent in 2015 for a method to provide customers with a new experience by allowing a customer representative to dynamically insert/replace content via ajax calls.  This allows customer representatives to display product/diagnostic information without requiring the customer to take action.

Developed (Currently in beta) a social network managing platform called Social Ninjas which allows customers to schedule posts onto many Social Media sites, built using Laravel and other repositories.  The innovation is that, by using a complex system, Social Ninja has the capability to make posts on Instagram on behalf of the user.  

Developed and released an Android app called Zero Taboos which is built using Ionic Framework and a PHP backend.

Achieved increased capacity and accuracy in both US and Global operations with technological solutions.

Simplified processes to create reports monitored by FINRA.

Utilized data from multiple systems to identify discrepancies and potential payment problems.

Designed and implemented databases and relationships using SQL to discover discrepancies between duties owed/paid to reduce over payments and fines.

Assembled critical data when regulatory changes took place.
Attempted to jumpstart online transportation retailing services to conduct B2C transactions for bus transportation companies

education.institution: University of Central Florida - College of Business Administration
